charges.charge_description: 18:37l: Conspiracy to violate 26:7206(2), aiding &; assisting the preparation of false and fraudulent tax returns. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP-Ct. 1-60 mos.; Cts. 2-37 3 mos. each, concurrent w/each other but consecutive toCt. 1 = 63 mos.; Ct. recs. El Reno FCI; deft to voluntarily surrender Noon, 8/28/98; SR 3 yrs. on Ct. 1, 1 yr. on Cts. 2-37, cc; $12,500 fine Ct. 1; Cost of prosecution $16,944.83; int. waived; SMA total $1850. (1)
